card.name: Gem-Knight Garnet
card.description: The Gem-Knight Warrior who carries the Garnet Soul. His Flaming Iron Fist crushes all enemies.

card.name: Gem-Knight Sapphire
card.description: His Sapphire power commands the waters to protect him from attack. His comrades trust in his silent protection.

card.name: Gem-Knight Tourmaline
card.description: He channels mystic energies and changes them into fighting strength through the power of Tourmaline. Many admire his way of life.

card.name: Gem-Knight Alexandrite
card.description: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Gem-Knight" Normal Monster from your Deck.

card.name: Gem-Armadillo
card.description: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Gem-Knight" monster from your Deck to your hand.

card.name: Gem-Merchant
card.description: During the Damage Step, in either player's turn, when a face-up EARTH Normal Monster you control attacks or is attacked: You can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard; that monster gains 1000 ATK and DEF until the End Phase.

card.name: Laval Miller
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can send 2 "Laval" monsters from your Deck to the Graveyard.

card.name: Soaring Eagle Above the Searing Land
card.description: If this card is sent to the Graveyard for a Synchro Summon: You can Special Summon this card. You must have 3 or more "Laval" monsters with different names in your Graveyard to activate and to resolve this effect. If this card is Special Summoned with this effect, banish it when it leaves the field.

card.name: Laval Warrior
card.description: When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the original ATK of the destroyed monster. You must have 4 or more "Laval" monsters with different names in your Graveyard to activate and to resolve this effect.

card.name: Prominence, Molten Swordsman
card.description: Once per turn, during either player's turn: You can banish 1 "Laval" monster from your Graveyard; this card gains 300 ATK until the End Phase.

card.name: Laval Forest Sprite
card.description: When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: All face-up "Laval" monsters you currently control gain 200 ATK for each "Laval" monster in your Graveyard, until the End Phase.

card.name: Kayenn, the Master Magma Blacksmith
card.description: You can banish this card from your Graveyard; all face-up "Laval" monsters you currently control gain 400 ATK.

card.name: Laval Burner
card.description: If you have 3 or more "Laval" monsters with different names in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand).

card.name: Laval Judgment Lord
card.description: Once per turn: You can banish 1 "Laval" monster from your Graveyard; inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. "Laval Judgment Lord" cannot declare an attack the turn this effect is activated.

card.name: Vylon Cube
card.description: If this card is sent to the Graveyard for the Synchro Summon of a LIGHT monster: You can add 1 Equip Spell Card from your Deck to your hand.

card.name: Vylon Vanguard
card.description: When this card is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard: You can draw 1 card for each Equip Card that was equipped to this card.

card.name: Vylon Charger
card.description: All face-up LIGHT monsters you control gain 300 ATK for each Equip Card equipped to this card.

card.name: Vylon Soldier
card.description: When this card declares an attack: You can target monsters your opponent controls, up to the number of Equip Cards equipped to this card; change those targets' battle positions.

card.name: Gem-Knight Ruby
card.description: "Gem-Knight Garnet" + 1 "Gem-Knight" monsterMust first be Fusion Summoned with the above Fusion Material Monsters. Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 face-up "Gem-" monster; this card gains ATK equal to the Tributed monster's ATK on the field, until the End Phase. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing Battle Damage to your opponent.

card.name: Gem-Knight Aquamarine
card.description: "Gem-Knight Sapphire" + 1 "Gem-Knight" monsterMust first be Fusion Summoned with the above Fusion Material Monsters. If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Target 1 card your opponent controls; return that target to the hand.

card.name: Gem-Knight Topaz
card.description: "Gem-Knight Tourmaline" + 1 "Gem-Knight" monsterMust first be Fusion Summoned with the above Fusion Material Monsters. This card can attack twice during each Battle Phase. When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster in the Graveyard.

card.name: Lavalval Dragon
card.description: 1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner FIRE monstersYou can shuffle 2 "Laval" monsters from your Graveyard into your Main Deck to target 1 card your opponent controls; return it to the hand.

card.name: Laval the Greater
card.description: 1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner FIRE monstersWhen this card is Synchro Summoned: Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard. If this card would be destroyed by a card effect, you can banish 1 "Laval" monster from your Graveyard instead.

card.name: Vylon Sigma
card.description: 1 LIGHT Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner LIGHT monstersWhen this card declares an attack, if it is the only monster you control: You can equip 1 Equip Spell Card from your Deck to this face-up card.

card.name: Vylon Epsilon
card.description: 1 LIGHT Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monstersEquip Cards equipped to this card cannot be targeted by cards or effects. Once per turn: You can send 1 Equip Card equipped to this card to the Graveyard to target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.

card.name: Gem-Knight Fusion
card.description: Fusion Summon 1 "Gem-Knight" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or your side of the field as Fusion Materials. If this card is in your Graveyard: You can banish 1 "Gem-Knight" monster from your Graveyard; add this card to your hand.

card.name: Searing Fire Wall
card.description: Banish any number of "Laval" monsters from your Graveyard; Special Summon an equal number of "Laval Tokens" (Pyro-Type/FIRE/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position.

card.name: Vylon Material
card.description: Equip only to a "Vylon" monster. It gains 600 ATK. If this face-up card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: You can add 1 "Vylon" Spell Card from your Deck to your hand.

card.name: Gem-Enhancement
card.description: Tribute 1 "Gem-Knight" monster, then target 1 "Gem-Knight" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target from the Graveyard.

card.name: Molten Whirlwind Wall
card.description: All face-up "Laval" monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each "Laval" monster in your Graveyard.

card.name: Gishki Abyss
card.description: When this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Gishki" monster with 1000 or less DEF from your Deck to your hand, except "Gishki Abyss".

card.name: Gishki Vanity
card.description: During your Main Phase: You can discard this card; this turn, your opponent cannot activate Spells, Traps, Spell/Trap effects, or Monster Card effects when a "Gishki" monster is Ritual Summoned, or when a "Gishki" Ritual Spell Card is activated.

card.name: Gishki Marker
card.description: When this card is Summoned: You can target 1 "Gishki" Ritual Monster or "Gishki" Ritual Spell Card in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.

card.name: Gishki Chain
card.description: If this card is Normal Summoned: Look at the top 3 cards of your Deck, you can reveal 1 Ritual Monster or 1 Ritual Spell Card among them and add it to your hand, also after that, place any remaining cards on the top of your Deck in any order.

card.name: Gishki Ariel
card.description: FLIP: You can add 1 "Gishki" monster from your Deck to your hand.

card.name: Gishki Shadow
card.description: If you Ritual Summon exactly 1 WATER Ritual Monster with a card effect that requires use of monsters, this card can be used as the entire requirement. You can discard this card; add 1 "Gishki" Ritual Spell Card from your Deck to your hand.

card.name: Gusto Gulldo
card.description: When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 Level 2 or lower "Gusto" monster from your Deck.

card.name: Gusto Egul
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower non-Tuner "Gusto" monster from your Deck.

card.name: Gusto Thunbolt
card.description: At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card is in the Graveyard because it was destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard this turn: You can banish 1 "Gusto" monster from your Graveyard; Special Summon 1 WIND Psychic-Type monster with 1500 or less DEF from your Deck.

card.name: Winda, Priestess of Gusto
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle with an opponent's attacking monster and sent to your Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 "Gusto" Tuner monster from your Deck.

card.name: Caam, Serenity of Gusto
card.description: Once per turn: You can shuffle 2 "Gusto" monsters from your Graveyard into the Main Deck; draw 1 card.

card.name: Windaar, Sage of Gusto
card.description: When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: You can target 1 Level 3 or lower "Gusto" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in face-up Defense Position.

card.name: Steelswarm Cell
card.description: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). While this card is face-up on the field, it cannot be Tributed, except for the Tribute Summon of a "Steelswarm" monster, and cannot be used as a Synchro Material Monster.

card.name: Steelswarm Scout
card.description: At the start of your Main Phase 1, if you control no Spell/Trap Cards: You can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard. You cannot Special Summon another monster(s) the turn you activate this effect. While this card is face-up on the field, it cannot be Tributed, except for the Tribute Summon of a "Steelswarm" monster, and cannot be used as a Synchro Material Monster.

card.name: Steelswarm Gatekeeper
card.description: If a "Steelswarm" monster is Tribute Summoned face-up while this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon or Set 1 monster in addition to your Normal Summon or Set that turn.

card.name: Steelswarm Caller
card.description: When a "Steelswarm" monster is Tribute Summoned face-up by Tributing this card: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Steelswarm" monster from your Deck.

card.name: Steelswarm Mantis
card.description: When this card is Tribute Summoned by Tributing a "Steelswarm" monster: You can pay 1000 Life Points to target 1 "Steelswarm" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

card.name: Steelswarm Moth
card.description: When this card is Tribute Summoned by Tributing a "Steelswarm" monster: You can pay 1000 Life Points to target up to 2 cards your opponent controls; return those targets to the hand.

card.name: Steelswarm Girastag
card.description: You can Tribute Summon this card in face-up Attack Position by Tributing 1 "Steelswarm" monster. When this card is Tribute Summoned by Tributing a "Steelswarm" monster(s): You can target 1 card your opponent controls; send that target to the Graveyard and gain 1000 Life Points.

card.name: Steelswarm Caucastag
card.description: When this card is Tribute Summoned by Tributing 2 "Steelswarm" monsters: Activate 1 of these effects.●Destroy all monsters on the field, except this card.●Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on the field.

card.name: Evigishki Mind Augus
card.description: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Gishki" Ritual Spell Card. When this card is Ritual Summoned: Target up to 5 cards in any Graveyard(s); shuffle those targets into the Deck.

card.name: Evigishki Soul Ogre
card.description: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Gishki" Ritual Spell Card. Once per turn: You can discard 1 "Gishki" monster to target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; shuffle that target into the Deck.

card.name: Daigusto Gulldos
card.description: 1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "Gusto" monstersOnce per turn: You can shuffle 2 "Gusto" monsters from your Graveyard into the Main Deck to target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.

card.name: Daigusto Eguls
card.description: 1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "Gusto" monstersOnce per turn, during your End Phase: You can banish 1 WIND monster from your Graveyard to target 1 face-down card your opponent controls; destroy that target.

card.name: Gishki Aquamirror
card.description: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "Gishki" Ritual Monster. You must also Tribute monsters from the field or your hand whose total Levels equal the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. You can shuffle this card from the Graveyard into the Deck to target 1 "Gishki" Ritual Monster in your Graveyard; return that target to the hand.

card.name: Contact with Gusto
card.description: Target 2 "Gusto" monsters in your Graveyard and 1 card your opponent controls; shuffle both targets in your Graveyard into the Deck, then destroy the opponent's target.

card.name: First Step Towards Infestation
card.description: Return 1 face-up Tribute Summoned "Steelswarm" monster you control to the hand; draw 1 card.

card.name: Aquamirror Meditation
card.description: Reveal 1 Ritual Spell Card in your hand to target 2 "Gishki" monsters in your Graveyard; return them to the hand.

card.name: Blessings for Gusto
card.description: Target 2 "Gusto" monsters in your Graveyard, plus a third "Gusto" monster in your Graveyard; shuffle both of the first 2 targets into your Deck, then Special Summon the third target.

card.name: Infestation Wave
card.description: Return 1 face-up Tribute Summoned "Steelswarm" monster you control to the hand to target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy that target.
